CachingHttpHeadersFilter - Class in org.servlet.filters
This filter is used in production, to put HTTP cache headers with a long (1 month) expiration time.
CachingHttpHeadersFilter() - Constructor for class org.servlet.filters.CachingHttpHeadersFilter
 
CharacterEncodingFilter - Class in org.servlet.filters
Sets the request and/or response character encoding based on the presence of either or both of the following init params, CharacterEncodingFilter.REQUEST_CHARSET_NAME CharacterEncodingFilter.RESPONSE_CHARSET_NAME.
CharacterEncodingFilter() - Constructor for class org.servlet.filters.CharacterEncodingFilter

Class that captures session and context events to glue everything together.

ClientCertFilter - Class in org.servlet.filters
ClientCertFilter is a filter which can be used to restrict access to a servlet by verifying aspects of the client certificate chain given to the servlet.
ClientCertFilter() - Constructor for class org.servlet.filters.ClientCertFilter
 
close() - Method in class org.servlet.filters.compression.CompressionResponseStream
 
CompressionFilter - Class in org.servlet.filters.compression
automatically compresses the response output stream, improving bandwidth utilization and providing a great demonstration of response object wrapping.
CompressionFilter() - Constructor for class org.servlet.filters.compression.CompressionFilter
 
CompressionResponseStream - Class in org.servlet.filters.compression
Any call to getOutputStream() or getWriter() returns an object using CompressResponseStream under the covers.
CompressionResponseStream(HttpServletResponse) - Constructor for class org.servlet.filters.compression.CompressionResponseStream
 
CompressionResponseWrapper - Class in org.servlet.filters.compression
CompressionFilter filter uses the wrapper class CompressionResponseWrapper, a custom class extending the standard HttpServletResponseWrapper.
CompressionResponseWrapper(HttpServletResponse) - Constructor for class org.servlet.filters.compression.CompressionResponseWrapper
